Package shadowman.simulation.status

Interface Summary
SimulationEvent  
StatusProvider Allows implementations to expose a @{link Status} for their given operation
StatusReporter<T> Defines service interface for reporting StatusProvider.Status
StatusThresholds<T> Allows for implementations to encapsulate logic per StatusProvider.Status to determine if any form of "threshold" has been met
 

Class Summary
EventBusSimulationActionStatusEventReporter StatusReporter implementation accepting SimulationStatusEvent defining reporting behavior/frequency by evaluation of IncrementingStatusThresholds.hasBeenMet(shadowman.simulation.status.StatusProvider.Status).
IncrementingStatusThresholds A thread-safe StatusThresholds implementation performing simple incrementing logic as IncrementingStatusThresholds.hasBeenMet(shadowman.simulation.status.StatusProvider.Status) is evaluated.
ScenarioStatusEvent  
SimulationStatusEvent  
 

Enum Summary
StatusProvider.Status
